item.title: Sneaky bugs: startsWith and indexOf with empty string
item.description: Found another sneaky bug while using String.startsWith().

item.title: Sneaky bugs: using lodash/trimStart to trim off a leading substring
item.description: Sneaky bugs are bugs that escape your first glance through the code. I’ve had this recently happen to me with lodash/trimStart.
